description:
This is a market on whether the Portuguese football/soccer player Cristiano Ronaldo leaves Manchester United within this market's timeframe, which spans from July 8, 2022, 10 PM ET, to August 2, 2022, 12 AM ET.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if, within this market's timeframe, an announcement is made that Cristiano Ronaldo has left Manchester United by signing a contract with another club, going on loan, or otherwise terminating his contract with Manchester United. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official announcements made by Manchester United or by a club that contracts Ronaldo; however, a consensus of credible reporting will also suffice. 

Please note that this market is about any type of contract which results in Cristiano Ronaldo not starting the next season as a Manchester United player, loans included. If the contract will have an effect in the future, and will result in Ronaldo starting the new season with Manchester United, this market will resolve to "No". If an announcement is made confirming that Ronaldo's contract with Manchester United has been terminated despite not joining a different club, this market will resolve to "Yes".

events.title: Will Cristiano Ronaldo leave Manchester United by August 1?

question: Will Cristiano Ronaldo leave Manchester United by August 1?
